name: The value of the word. Interconnections II.
description:
Artist: Daiana Lazzarin
Country: Argentina 
Category: Painting
Support: Table
Technique: Acrylic
Measurements: 73 x 53 cm
Year: 2012
The interconnections through the word, through the different media, Internet, E-mail, Facebook, and Ultrasonic Radio Waves, are represented in a galactic environment, composed of real and fictitious planets. Through the double face, the antagonism of action (word) and reflection (thought) is represented.
This work participated in the collective exhibition "The value of the Word", in the room "Where the Moon sleeps", Mendoza Argentina.
